content:
On the night of April 2, 2024, the enemy attacked a managed aviation missile X-59 from the airspace of Tot of the Zaporozhye region, as well as ten percussion drones from Cape Chaud (Crimea).

About thisreportedAir Force Commander Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk.

He noted that the units of the mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed nine "Shahd-136/131" within the Dnipropetrovsk region.
title: At night the air defense forces destroyed 9 "Shahmed"
description: This was reported by the Commander of the Air Force Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk. He...
author: Army Inform
